summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of Enterprise One workspace application completed successfully. Backend API testing achieved 100% success rate (96/96 tests passed). Frontend UI testing confirmed all major functionality works correctly including login, dashboards, CRM, Projects kanban board, HR, Finance, and Subscription modules. Role-based access control is properly implemented and working as expected.

ui_bugs.issue: Overlay element sometimes intercepts clicks when closing waffle menu
ui_bugs.workaround: Click outside or use ESC key to close

integration_issues.issue: Minor timing issues with select dropdowns in create/edit forms, but functionality works

passed_tests: Backend API: All 96 endpoint tests passed (100% success rate)
Login functionality with all 4 demo accounts
Dashboard page loads with stats cards and charts
CRM page: leads table, search, create lead, deals pipeline, create deal
Projects page: kanban board display, task creation, column organization
HR page: employee directory, leave request creation and approval
Finance page: invoices and expenses tables, expense creation
Subscription page: pricing plans display correctly
Role-based access control: Employee correctly denied CRM/Users/Audit Logs access
Role-based access control: Super Admin has full access to all modules
Frontend-backend integration for all CRUD operations
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor improvements: 1) Fix waffle menu overlay z-index issue for better click handling, 2) Add small delays to dropdown selections in modals for smoother UX. Overall application is production-ready with excellent functionality.
